per_frame_1=q1 = 0.0003*(pow(1+1.2*bass+0.4*bass_att+0.1*treb+0.1*treb_att+0.1*mid+0.1*mid_att,6));
per_frame_2=monitor = q1;
per_frame_3=wave_r = wave_r + 0.5*sin(time*0.565);
per_frame_4=wave_g = wave_g + 0.5*sin(time*0.615);
per_frame_5=wave_b = wave_b + 0.5*sin(time*0.665);
per_pixel_1=zoom = zoom + 0.025;
per_pixel_2=//rot = rot + 0.05*sin(fps*100)*q1;
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`
warp_4=`    float2 d = texsize.zw*4;
warp_5=`    float3 dx = GetBlur1(frac(uv+float2(1,0)*d))-GetBlur1(frac(uv-float2(1,0)*d));
warp_6=`    float3 dy = GetBlur1(frac(uv+float2(0,1)*d))-GetBlur1(frac(uv-float2(0,1)*d));
warp_7=`    float3 b1 = GetBlur1(uv) - 0;
warp_8=`    d *= -1;
warp_9=`    float d2 = d*4;
warp_10=`    float1 c1 = 0.042;
warp_11=`    float1 c2 = -0.0075;
warp_12=`
warp_13=`
warp_14=`    float2 my_uv = uv - float2(dx.y,dy.y)*d - float2(dx.x,dy.x)*d2;
warp_15=`    ret.y = tex2D( sampler_fc_main, my_uv-floor(my_uv)).y;
warp_16=`    ret.y += (ret.y - b1.y)*c1 + c2;
warp_17=`
warp_18=`
warp_19=`    my_uv = uv - float2(dx.x,dy.x)*d - float2(dx.z,dy.z)*d2;
warp_20=`    ret.x = tex2D( sampler_fc_main, my_uv-floor(my_uv)).x;
warp_21=`    ret.x += (ret.x - b1.x)*c1 + c2;
warp_22=`
warp_23=`
warp_24=`    my_uv = uv - float2(dx.z,dy.z)*d - float2(dx.y,dy.y)*d2;
warp_25=`    ret.z = tex2D( sampler_fc_main, my_uv-floor(my_uv)).z;
warp_26=`    ret.z += (ret.z - b1.z)*c1 + c2;
warp_27=`//ret = 0;
warp_28=`
warp_29=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`    float2 d = texsize.zw;
comp_4=`    float3 dx = ( GetPixel(uv+float2(1,0)*d)-GetPixel(uv-float2(1,0)*d) );
comp_5=`    float3 dy = ( GetPixel(uv+float2(0,1)*d)-GetPixel(uv-float2(0,1)*d) );
comp_6=`float2 dz = float2(dx.y,dy.y)*3;
comp_7=`
comp_8=`d = texsize.zw*2;
comp_9=`dx = ( GetBlur1(uv+float2(1,0)*d)-GetBlur1(uv-float2(1,0)*d) );
comp_10=`dy = ( GetBlur1(uv+float2(0,1)*d)-GetBlur1(uv-float2(0,1)*d) );
comp_11=`
comp_12=`dz +=float2(dx.y,dy.y);
comp_13=`
comp_14=`float3 bg = pow(length(dz)*0.8+0,0.7)*2 + GetBlur1(uv).y*2;
comp_15=`
comp_16=`ret = bg*float3(0.2,0.3,0.6);
comp_17=`float2 uv_swimmer =frac(0.5 + (uv-0.5)+float2(q19,q20)*float2(-1,1));
comp_18=`ret = lerp(ret,float3(3,2,1),GetBlur3(uv_swimmer -float2(dx.y,dy.y)).x);
comp_19=`ret = lerp(ret,0,GetBlur2(uv_swimmer-dz).x);
comp_20=`ret = lerp(ret,float3(0,0,0),1.5*GetPixel(uv_swimmer).x);
comp_21=`
comp_22=`//ret = GetPixel(uv);
comp_23=`}
